         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16865943">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16865943">

          </p>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16865944">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16865944">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16865944">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Cultural Analysis
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16865944">
          <div id="boxatt16865944" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19903917">
              <a id="link_19903917" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903917,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903917}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Gives basic demographics of a country, plus overview of political system. Most recent year only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25350990">
              <a id="link_25350990" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/931883750?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25350990,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350990}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Eastern &amp; Southern Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The former of these two regions, the eastern part, is made up of the following countries: Djibouti, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Somalia, and South Sudan (all of the Horn area and inland), along with, below the Horn, Burundi, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mozambique, Rwanda, Seychelles, Tanzania, and Uganda. Some models shift the southeastern nations of Comoros, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mozambique, and Seychelles to the southern region of Africa, but here we include them under Eastern Africa. In Southern Africa, therefore, we have Botswana, Lesotho, Malawi, Namibia, South Africa, Swaziland, Zambia, and Zimbabwe. All told, 23 nations are examined in this volume.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25350985">
              <a id="link_25350985" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/933298758?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25350985,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25350985}); ">
               Countries, Peoples &amp; Cultures: Western &amp; Central Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The first of these two regions, the western part, is made up of the following 16 countries: Benin, Burkina Faso, Cape Verde, Cote d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast), The Gambia, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Liberia, Mali, Mauritania, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, and Togo. The second region, Central Africa, consists of the following 9 countries: Angola, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of the Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, São Tomé &amp; Príncipe. All told, then, 25 nations are examined in this volume.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25147280">
              <a id="link_25147280" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/231687022?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147280,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147280}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Angola
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25147287">
              <a id="link_25147287" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/65404295?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147287,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147287}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Cameroon
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25147489">
              <a id="link_25147489" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/52734130?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147489,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147489}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Ghana
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25147284">
              <a id="link_25147284" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/56336802?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147284,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147284}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Kenya
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25142398">
              <a id="link_25142398" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/745865741?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25142398,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25142398}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Namibia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25142388">
              <a id="link_25142388" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/58390242?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25142388,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25142388}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Nigeria
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25147544">
              <a id="link_25147544" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/4594411218?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25147544,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25147544}); ">
               Culture and Customs of Zambia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23669491">
              <a id="link_23669491" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.eblib.com/patron/FullRecord.aspx?p=794545" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23669491,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23438519}); ">
               Ethnic Groups of Africa and the Middle East : An Encyclopedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Ethnic Groups of Africa and the Middle East contains encyclopedic entries arranged alphabetically within ethno-linguistic classifications. Each entry has four main sections: an introduction identifying the language group, where they are found, and their numbers; a brief discussion of their origins and early history; a section on cultural life that includes religion, literature, social organization, and art; and a final section on political organization and recent history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19903964">
              <a id="link_19903964" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903964,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903964}); ">
               Europa World Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Demographics including health, welfare, and education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904123">
              <a id="link_19904123" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904123,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904123}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. See especially the "Consumer Lifestyle Reports" containing demographics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904137">
              <a id="link_19904137" href="http://data.worldbank.org/indicator" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904137,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904137}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many demographic statistics, especially regarding wealth distribution. Choose the Data by Indicators, then click on the desired topic to get a complete list of countries.  Time series.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143735">
              <a id="link_25143735" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/659392167?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143735}); ">
               World Trade Press: Angola
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143739">
              <a id="link_25143739" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/659392187?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143739,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143739}); ">
               World Trade Press: Cameroon
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143757">
              <a id="link_25143757" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/659392160?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143757,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143757}); ">
               World Trade Press: Kenya
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143749">
              <a id="link_25143749" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/659392217?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143749,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143749}); ">
               World Trade Press: Lesotho
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143734">
              <a id="link_25143734" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/659392189?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143734,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143734}); ">
               World Trade Press: Nigeria
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25143753">
              <a id="link_25143753" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/645096245?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25143753,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25143753}); ">
               World Trade Press: Swaziland
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20358802">
              <a id="link_20358802" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com/ps/i.do?id=GALE%7C9781414448930&amp;v=2.1&amp;u=mul_coll&amp;it=etoc&amp;p=GVRL&amp;sw=w" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20358802,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20358802}); ">
               Worldmark Encyclopedia of Cultures and Daily Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides information on the cultures of the world, covering different areas of daily life including clothing, food, language and religion.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16866345">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16866345">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16866345">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Economic Analysis
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16866345">
          <div id="boxatt16866345" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23766457">
              <a id="link_23766457" href="http://www.bti-project.org/reports/country-reports/index.nc" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23766457,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23766457}); ">
               BTI Transformation Index
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Bertelsmann Stiftung’s Transformation Index (BTI) analyzes and evaluates the quality of democracy, a market economy and political management in 129 developing and transition countries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904206">
              <a id="link_19904206" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904206,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904206}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Basic economic data such as GNP.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25142617">
              <a id="link_25142617" href="http://export.gov/ccg/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25142617,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25142617}); ">
               Country Commercial Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Look no further than the U.S. Commercial Service’s Country Commercial Guides, written by U.S. Embassy trade experts worldwide….. An excellent starting point for everything you need to know about exporting and doing business overseas detailing 8 important weigh stations on your export journey.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904563">
              <a id="link_19904563" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.europaworld.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904563,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904563}); ">
               Europa World Yearbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Transportation systems, communication and media. Includes an "Economic Affairs" report with GNP percentage by industry.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904587">
              <a id="link_19904587" href="http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/inter-natlinks/sd_natstat.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904587,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904587}); ">
               National Statistical Offices
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A directory of statistical offices of countries around the globe.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19904598">
              <a id="link_19904598" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19904598,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904598}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "Consumer Lifestyles Reports" contain data and text on labor, income, population, media and communication systems, transportation, and distribution channels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19905152">
              <a id="link_19905152" href="http://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19905152,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905152}); ">
               U.S.State Department Background Notes
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Current analysis of economy and politics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19905163">
              <a id="link_19905163" href="http://data.worldbank.org/topic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19905163,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905163}); ">
               World Bank
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. Good for media and communication, internet use, science and technology, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16866941">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16866941">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16866941">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Market Audit and Competitive Analysis
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16866941">
          <div id="boxatt16866941" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19964631">
              <a id="link_19964631" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19964631,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19964631}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals. May include reports about consumers, target markets, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19964615">
              <a id="link_19964615" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19964615,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19964615}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of news sources, arr. by region and country. May include reports about consumers, etc.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19905197">
              <a id="link_19905197" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19905197,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905197}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The Consumer Lifestyles Reports contains hard-to-find data on consumer buying habits and lifestyles. If a Consumer Lifestyles Report is not available for your country, there may be other reports that give clues about consumer behavior in your country.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19905217">
              <a id="link_19905217" href="http://www.export.gov/mrktresearch/index.asp" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19905217,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19905217}); ">
               U.S. Commercial Service Market Research Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free resource. See U.S. Dept. of Commerce's "Country Commercial Guides" and other country-specific economic reports.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20280823">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20280823">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20280823">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Overall Project
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20280823">
          <div id="boxatt20280823" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23672321">
              <a id="link_23672321" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23672321,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19904123}); ">
               Passport Reference via Euromonitor
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. See especially the "Consumer Lifestyle Reports" containing demographics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">

      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16865950">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16865950">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16865950">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16865950">
          <div id="boxatt16865950" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19903774">
              <a id="link_19903774" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903774,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903774}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19903775">
              <a id="link_19903775" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903775,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Globalization &amp; Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903775}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
